## Hello!

My name is Caitlin McCann and I am a current Master's student studying horticulture in the University of Georgia's Institute of Plant Breeding, Genetics, and Genomics. I am an alumnus of the University of Alabama, where I earned a BS in Biology with a minor in Blount/Liberal Arts. - You can access my resume [here](Images_files\2023 McCann Resume (1).pdf)
